title: question about PBE
body: if im selected into the PBE will i get a notification in my league client i dont tend to check my email that often

replies.body: PBE acceptance notifications would be provided in an email.  If you're ever unsure, you can also login to your account on the[ PBE page ](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe)to see what step you're in.  I hope that helps!
Is there a time frame for receiving access because i have applied maybe 1 1 and a half year ago and still didn't get any reply.
No,you dont get a notification in the client.You should check your email every once and then.
